alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 8:33AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN JUAB...SOUTHWESTERN UTAH AND SOUTHEASTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 832 AM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from near Provo to near Vernon...and moving east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Provo, Payson, Spanish Fork, Springville, Santaquin, Mapleton, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Rocky Ridge, Brigham Young University, Benjamin, Palmyra, Lake Shore, Spring Lake, Utah Lake, West Mountain, Elberta, Genola and Goshen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 238 and 267. US Route 6 between mile markers 139 and 180. * strong winds in excess of 45 mph are possible with this squall. * sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.
